measure.name: modify_xml
measure.description: Modify the contents of an existing, valid XML file
measure.modeler_description: The measure changes values of requested XML fields

argument.name: xml_file_path
argument.description: Path to existing XML file to modify

argument.name: save_file_path
argument.description: Path to save new xml file

argument.name: heating_setpoint_offset
argument.description: Degrees to change heating setpoint

argument.name: cooling_setpoint_offset
argument.description: Degrees to change cooling setpoint

argument.name: air_leakage_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the air leakage rate. Positive value increases air leakage, negative value decreases air leakage. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: heating_efficiency_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the heating equipment efficiency. Positive value increases efficiency, negative value decreases efficiency. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: cooling_efficiency_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the cooling equipment efficiency. Positive value increases efficiency, negative value decreases efficiency. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: misc_load_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the various miscellaneous load usage multipliers. Positive value increases load, negative value decreases load. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: roof_r_value_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the Roof R-value. Positive value increases R-Value, negative value decreases R-value. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: ceiling_r_value_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the ceiling (attic floor) R-value. Positive value increases R-Value, negative value decreases R-value. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: floor_r_value_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the floor R-value. Positive value increases R-Value, negative value decreases R-value. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: above_ground_walls_r_value_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the above-ground wall R-value. Positive value increases R-Value, negative value decreases R-value. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: below_ground_walls_r_value_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the below-ground wall R-value. Positive value increases R-Value, negative value decreases R-value. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: slab_r_value_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the foundation slab R-value. Positive value increases R-Value, negative value decreases R-value. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: water_heater_efficiency_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the Energy Factor or Unified Energy Factor. Positive value increases efficiency (EF/UEF), negative value decreases efficiency (EF/UEF). Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: water_fixtures_usage_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the water fixtures usage multiplier. Positive value increases usage, negative value decreases usage. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: lighting_load_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the lighting load. Positive value increases lighting load, negative value decreases lighting load. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: window_u_factor_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the window U-factor. Positive value increases U-factor, negative value decreases U-factor. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: window_shgc_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change the window SHGC. Positive value increases SHGC, negative value decreases SHGC. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.

argument.name: appliance_usage_multiplier
argument.description: Percentage to change usage_multiplier of all appliances. Positive value increases usage_multiplier, negative value decreases usage_multiplier. Expressed as a multiplier of the original number. Examples: 0.1 == 10x reduction, and 10 == 10x increase.
